title: When Yasuos think they can Windwall Azir's Soldiers

embed.description: Zach laughing in dinner for schmucks

replies.body: You kinda can. You can't stop their autos but you can stop them when he tries to move them with Q. You can also windwall Azir's ult, oddly enough.

Yasuo can actually
If you try to q your soldier behind yasuo and he windwalls
the soldier will stop at the windwall
same with your ult
he can wind wall to make it stop moving
